_sText:
de_metrobudapest is a port of the de_metrobudapest map from the Counter-Strike: Global Offensive game.

On 12-SEP-2010 the first Metro Budapest map has been released for CS:S. This small, renovated, anniversary version is here to commemorate that event while also looking back at r.man's past 15 years of involvement with Source.

New features:

Fitted for Demolition gameplay with two bomb sites (Classic and Deathmatch are also available), new cover layout, mid section and trains are running on both sides. The first arrivals are random between 5-17 sec, than 20 second each until the actual round ends. For better tracking of these intervals several counters has been placed for each directions. Trains will sound their horns if a player is within dangerous range.
